mapper.insert: insert into groups (group_name, comment, content, trashed, edit_date, user_id) values (#{groupName},#{comment}, #{content},'F',now(),#{creater.id});
mapper.update: update groups set group_name=#{groupName}, comment=#{comment}, content=#{content},edit_date=now() where group_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select group_id , group_name, comment, content, edit_date from groups where group_id=#{id}
